page.title: 18BIOGRAPHY
page.content: {THE ASSISTANT MANAGER-MARTON QUARRY. {************************************} The company's policy is to appoint a general quarries manager for the whole country and then appoint assistant managers at each quarry. High qualifications are necessary rather than local knowledge and the present assistant manager is a young graduate whose home is in London. The job is obviously a stepping stone in his career, giving him grass-roots experience. This is evident in the mundane daily operation of the quarry. A knowledge of geology is obviously necessary in the reading of test bores and local geological maps, but this is only a small portion of the work which is mainly administrative or the maintenance of equipment.The assistant manager feels that the present quarry "still has a few more years in it".
